main event: A civilian reported seeing a single unidentified flying object (UFO) over Hopewell Junction, New York on August 7, 1968.
interesting points: The object was sighted for approximately 15 minutes.
The object was described as two flat, round objects that were silvery in color, moving slowly and fluttering, occasionally disappearing from view.
The sighting occurred in the early morning around 7:30 AM.
The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the UFO and a diagram showing the trajectory and angular elevation.
The witness had previously reported the sighting to the Air Force in December 1968, but the report was deemed inconclusive due to the delay in reporting.
